title: Review of in vitro studies evaluating respiratory toxicity of aerosols: impact of cell types, chemical composition, and atmospheric processing
content:
Environ. Sci.: Processes Impacts, 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4EM00475B, Critical Review
Sudheer Salana, Vishal Verma
This review focuses on the impact of cell types and other experimental factors such as exposure duration, dose, chemical composition, and atmospheric processing of PM, on the results of cell-based assays.
To cite this article before page numbers are assigned, use the DOI form of citation above.
